observation: Digital Red – Professional & friendly technical support for individuals and small businesses  Call Daniel on 020 3411 4445 for telephone technical support Internet Services Domain names Setting up your email account Microsoft Outlook Android iPhone iPhone can’t send email Email hosting Email Filtering Reliable hosting Constant Data Protection Digital Red Hosting 1000 account details WordPress Buying Networking equipment Network switch Powerline adapter Wireless Access Point Buying Microsoft Office Mobile SIM card sizes Technical Support Microsoft Office help Microsoft Windows help Taking screenshots in Windows Easy image resizing Identifying cables Charges for technical support Admin Support Office Administration & Accounting Support Accounting assistance Responsible Adult About Contact Can Digital Red help me? Timothy Paying your invoice Digital Red opening hours Select Page Welcome to Digital Red Digital Red specialises in professional and friendly technical support for small businesses, homeworkers and individuals. It is based in Ruislip Manor – 15 miles north west of Central London with customers locally, throughout London, around the country and all over the world. Professional and friendly technical support Digital Red is run by me, Daniel O’Neill Internet If you have got something that doesn’t work properly, have some new gadgets that won’t behave, need to buy some new equipment, want to start doing some proper backups via WhatsApp Digital office administration and online accounting With the increase in home- and remote-working brought about by the pandemic, office administration processes need updating. As we work differently, bookkeeping and accounting is also moving towards the cloud – I can help you with the switch from old, offline, systems like Sage 50 Accounts to the new online services like Xero and QuickBooks online.. Living in Ruislip Manor, working from home, and don’t have a printer? Read how Pay your invoice online securely About Digital Red Digital Red provides small businesses, home workers and individuals with friendly and professional technical support on all aspects of IT and PC use. Digital Red is based north west of London in Ruislip. Remote Support To start a remote desktop support session, click this button. Telephone Support 020 3411 4445 Hours of business Quick links Password generator Software updates CryptoLocker Cables Outlook autocomplete F1 and WEC race dates © Copyright 1997-2023 Home Pay an invoice Telephone number for technical support:

thought: The certificate information shows a valid certificate issued by Let's Encrypt, which is common for legitimate websites. The domain name is also associated with multiple subdomains, suggesting that it is used for various services and not just a single-page scam site. Next, I should verify the domain's age, as that can be a good indicator of legitimacy.

Unfortunately, I am experiencing persistent issues retrieving the WHOIS information. However, I can still perform other checks. I should now look at the DNS records to confirm the domain's setup and see if it matches typical business use.

The DNS records show that digitalred.com has a typical setup for a small business, including MX records pointing to Google's email services, which is a sign of a legitimate setup. The presence of SPF and Google site verification also suggests that the domain is being actively managed and is likely tied to a real business. At this point, I have not found any of the typical characteristics of a scam website. There's one last step I can take, which is to search for any online reports or reviews about this domain.
